ComicInfo.Title: Missing... One Head; Throw Another Coal on the Fire; Lost in the Graveyard; The Monster!; Find the Pin and Pick It Up
ComicInfo.Summary: A creature from an underground civilization is sent as a scout to determine the weaknesses of the surface world, but none of the surface dwellers are afraid of his monstrous form, as he expected.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Authorized A. C. M. P. Conforms to the Comics Code
ComicInfo.Penciller: Bill Benulis,George Tuska,Ed Winiarski,Tony Di Preta
ComicInfo.Inker: Sy Barry,George Tuska,Ed Winiarski,Tony Di Preta
